name: Code Generator Pro
author: WalletStation.com

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to create code generators for Xbox Live codes, Amazon codes, Minecraft codes, etc. In order for a
user to obtain a code, they must go to a url, that your provide, to obtain a password. Once they obtain a password, they enter
it in the generator to get a code.

Features
-Create unlimited generators.

-Create unlimited codes.

-Create unlimited URLs.

-URLs are randomized.

-Each generator has its own style.

-Generators can be added on posts or pages.

-Codes can only be accessed by one person at a time. A code becomes active once one of its URLs are accessed. If a password isn’t entered, the code becomes non-active in an hour.

-Once a password is entered, the code and its URLs are deleted.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Released

1.1

  • Increase URL size.
  • Added upgrade function.

1.2

  • Made free.
  • Added donation section.
